revision.comment: [[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/PrimeBOT 30|Task 30]] - parameter updates for [[Template:Certification Table Entry]] and related (+genfixes)
revision.text:
{{Infobox album | name = Justin Timberlake: Live from London | type = video | artist = [[Justin Timberlake]] | cover = Justin Timberlake Live from London.png | border = yes | alt = | released = {{Start date|2003|12|15}} | recorded = 2002–2003 | venue = | studio = | genre = | length = | label = [[Jive Records|Jive]] | producer = {{flatlist| *[[The Neptunes]] }} | prev_title = | prev_year = | next_title = [[FutureSex/LoveShow: Live from Madison Square Garden]] | next_year = 2007 | misc = {{Singles | name = Justin Timberlake: Live from London | type = video | single1 = [[I'm Lovin' It (song)|I'm Lovin' It]] | single1date = November 20, 2003 }} }} '''''Justin Timberlake: Live from London''''' is the first live [[video album]] by American singer-songwriter [[Justin Timberlake]]. It was released on December 15, 2003, by [[Jive Records]]. It documents Timberlake's performance at the [[London Arena]] on May 18, 2003.{{cite web|url=http://www.allmovie.com/movie/justin-timberlake-live-from-london-v295322|title=Justin Timberlake: Live from London (2003) - Trailers, Reviews, Synopsis, Showtimes and Cast - AllMovie|work=AllMovie}} == Track listing == {{Track listing | headline = DVD | total_length = | title1 = Intro | title2 = [[Rock Your Body]] | title3 = Right for Me | title4 = [[Gone ('N Sync song)|Gone]]/[[Girlfriend ('N Sync song)|Girlfriend]]/[[Señorita (Justin Timberlake song)|Señorita]] | title5 = Nothin' Else | title6 = Tap Dance | title7 = [[Cry Me a River (Justin Timberlake song)|Cry Me a River]] | title8 = [[Like I Love You]] }} {{Track listing | headline = DVD (bonus features) | collapsed = | total_length = | title9 = Tour Photo Diary | title10 = [[I'm Lovin' It (song)|I'm Lovin' It]] | note10 = music video }} {{Track listing | extra_column = Producer(s) | headline = Bonus Audio CD | total_length = | title1 = I'm Lovin' It | note1 = featuring Vanessa Marquez | writer1 = {{flat list| *[[Pharrell Williams]] *Tom Batoy *Andreas Forberger *Franco Tortora }} | extra1 = [[The Neptunes|The Neps]] | title2 = Worthy Of | writer2 = {{flat list| *Justin Timberlake *[[Carvin Haggins]] *[[Ivan Barias]] *[[Frank Romano]] *[[Valvin Roane]] *James Mitchell Jr. *Marvin Willis *Arnold Ingram }} | extra2 = [[Carvin & Ivan (Karma Productions)|Carvin "Ransum" Haggins & Ivan "Orthodox" Barias]] | title3 = Rock Your Body | note3 = Paul Oakenfold Mix | writer3 = {{flat list| *Justin Timberlake *Chad Hugo *Pharrell Williams }} | extra3 = {{flat list| *The Neps *[[Paul Oakenfold]] }} | title4 = Señorita | note4 = Eddie Arroyo Radio Mix | writer4 = {{flat list| *Justin Timberlake *Chad Hugo *Pharrell Williams }} | extra4 = {{flat list| *The Neps *Eddie Arroyo }} }} == Chart positions== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! Charts (2004) ! Peak
position |- ! scope="row"| US [[Billboard (magazine)|''Billboard'' Music DVD Chart]]{{cite web | url=http://www.billboard.biz/bbbiz/charts/chart-search-results/videos/3052309 | title=Top Music Video – Issue Date: 2004-01-10 | publisher=Billboard.biz. Prometheus Global Media | accessdate=September 8, 2012}} | style="text-align:center;"| 11 |- |} == Certifications == {{Certification Table Top}} {{Certification Table Entry|region=Australia|relyear=2003|type=video|award=Gold|certyear=2007|artist=Justin Timberlake|title=Live from London}} {{Certification Table Entry|region=United Kingdom|relyear=2003|type=video|award=Gold|certyear=2013|artist=Justin Timberlake|title=Live from London}} {{Certification Table Entry|region=United States|relyear=2003|type=video|award=Gold|certyear=2013|artist=Justin Timberlake|title=Live from London}} {{Certification Table Bottom}} == Release history == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Country ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| Ref. |- ! scope="row"| Germany | rowspan="2"| December 15, 2003 | [[Sony Music Entertainment|Sony]] | {{cite web|url=https://www.amazon.de/Justin-Timberlake-Live-From-London/dp/B0000E5PCO|title=Justin Timberlake - Live From London|publisher=|via=Amazon}} |- ! scope="row"| United Kingdom | [[RCA Records|RCA]] | {{cite web|url=https://www.amazon.co.uk/Justin-Timberlake-London-bonus-audio/dp/B00013YQ6A|title=Justin Timberlake - Live From London|date=15 December 2003|publisher=|via=Amazon}} |- ! scope="row"| United States | December 16, 2003 | [[Jive Records|Jive]] | {{cite web|url=https://www.amazon.com/Justin-Timberlake-Live-From-London/dp/B0000DYVRS|title=Justin Timberlake - Live From London|date=16 December 2003|publisher=|via=Amazon}} |- |} == References == {{reflist|30em}} {{Justin Timberlake}} [[Category:2003 video albums]] [[Category:Justin Timberlake albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by The Neptunes]] [[Category:Jive Records video albums]] [[Category:Live video albums]]
